feed.subtitle: Jigsaw falling into place. So there is nothing to explain.

entry.title: Mamdani Fuzzy Neural Network - Architecture & Learning Algorithm

link.title: Mamdani Fuzzy Neural Network - Architecture & Learning Algorithm

entry.summary: A comprehensive guide to the Mamdani-based Fuzzy Neural Network (FNN). Learn its 5-layer architecture, step-by-step fuzzy inference process, and how to train it using the error backpropagation algorithm. Discover how this model blends the interpretability of fuzzy logic with the adaptive power of neural networks.

entry.title: A Comprehensive Guide to the Takagi-Sugeno (T-S) Fuzzy Inference Model

link.title: A Comprehensive Guide to the Takagi-Sugeno (T-S) Fuzzy Inference Model

entry.summary: Explore the Takagi-Sugeno (T-S) fuzzy inference model, a powerful tool for modeling and controlling complex nonlinear systems. This guide covers the structure, mathematical principles, step-by-step implementation, code examples in MATLAB and Python, and real-world applications across industries.

entry.title: Implement a SkipList based K-V Database in Java

link.title: Implement a SkipList based K-V Database in Java

entry.summary: Skiplist is linked list with layers. The implementation of a skiplist is quite easier than trees. It is a K-V Database based on SkipList written in Java.

entry.title: KMP Pattern Searching Demo
entry.summary: The Knuth–Morris–Pratt algorithm (or KMP algorithm) is a string-searching algorithm that searches for occurrences of a "word" W within a main "text string" S

entry.title: MathJax Cheat Sheet in LaTeX
entry.summary: The basic usage of MathJax using LaTeX syntax. A MathJax Cheat Sheet
